CONTENT.TITLE: Discover your market in no time
CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: Highly detailed ecommerce market reports, covering a good number of industries, across the globe.

SIDE_CONTENT.TOP: Our online store offers a range of ready-to-buy Ecommerce reports with detailed information on current and future industry insights, trends, market sales, as well as risk assessments on the global markets.
SIDE_CONTENT.BOTTOM: Our bespoke Ecommerce research and strategy services will benefit new and established businesses looking to break into the global markets.

SIDE_CONTENT.TITLE: Stay up to date
SIDE_CONTENT.TEXT: Interested in more of market insights? Subscribe to our free newsletter content by submitting your email.

SERVICE_CTA.TITLE: All for free
SERVICE_CTA.DESCRIPTION: Tons of Ecommerce market data out there, and organizing all of that information into something workable and useful is the hard part. That's why we've created our premium market research store Monitorables solely for online shops.
SERVICE_CTA.MOBILE_DESCRIPTION: Mobile access to manage your research library from anywhere.
SERVICE_CTA.CLOUD_DESCRIPTION: Free pdf file storage for your existing reports.
SERVICE_CTA.WEBSITE_DESCRIPTION: Monitorables.com is the control center for your researches.

GLOBE.TEXT_TOP: Our online store aims specifically Ecommerce market and offers a range of ready-to-buy reports on current and future industry insights, trends as well as risk assessments on the global markets.
GLOBE.TEXT_BOTTOM: From new startups, small companies to global enterprises, people everywhere use Monitorables to see and understand their target market. Our market research services will benefit new and established businesses looking to break into the global markets.

BANNER.TITLE: Ecommerce Services
BANNER.DESCRIPTION: Monitorables is a market research store which provides continuously updated Ecommerce data analysis and reports.

HEADER.TITLE: Getting ready for the global Ecommerce market?
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: We know you expect the best quality for your market and industry reports. No worries, we have got you covered with industry insights, trends, market sales, as well as risk assessments.

CONTENT_RESEARCH.TITLE: Market Research Store
CONTENT_RESEARCH.QUOTE: Wide range of research solutions tailored to your needs. Our market research reports cover various services, consumer goods and companies.
CONTENT_RESEARCH.DESCRIPTION: At Monitorables, we provide highly detailed studies, covering a good number of industries across the globe. Our extensive industry knowledge mainly focuses on emerging industries and regions. We are a trustworthy and reliable provider of necessary market analysis and research.

CONTENT_CLOUD.TITLE: Online document storage
CONTENT_CLOUD.QUOTE: Store, organize and access your documents with ease. Get the right amount of storage space for your research files free of charge.
CONTENT_CLOUD.DESCRIPTION: Monitorables document storage service helps you create a high-quality library of your market researches. It is designed to help you quickly and easily store your market research related documents, such as pdf and text files. Comes with many features to make your workflow a little smoother.

CONTENT_MOBILE.TITLE: Mobile Access
CONTENT_MOBILE.QUOTE: Monitorables dashboard and research file viewer is available across the web and mobile devices. Easy access your research files from multiple devices.
CONTENT_MOBILE.DESCRIPTION: With Monitorables personal dashboard, organize anything anywhere! All-Platform synchronization: View and manage your market research documents wherever you are. Support seamless synchronization and feature sharing within iPhone, Mac, Android, Windows, iPad.

CONTENT_DASHBOARD.TITLE: Personal Dashboard
CONTENT_DASHBOARD.QUOTE: Monitorables dashboard helps research lovers get more done.
CONTENT_DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION: Put all your Ecommerce related research work at your fingertips with Monitorables dashboard. It ticks all the boxes and then some, easy to use, making it easier than ever to organize and access your researches. Utilize your Ecommerce market research reports in a fun and rewarding way with the Monitorables dashboard.

CONTENT_SECURE.TITLE: Secure and Private
CONTENT_SECURE.QUOTE: Keep your Ecommerce research documents safe with our strong user-based security.
CONTENT_SECURE.DESCRIPTION: By storing your research documents in Monitorables, you will gain the control and confidence you need to securely store your confidential research reports. All customers benefit from our secure platform for their top-secret workloads free of charge.

REGISTER_CTA.TITLE: Is market research important for your Ecommerce business?
REGISTER_CTA.DESCRIPTION: Markets change, industries evolve. Are you going to be ready? Know the 'why' to recognize your following opportunity. Launch a service or product, enter an existing market or a new one, target existing customers or new ones, just stay prepared for the change.
REGISTER_CTA.LIST_ITEM_1: Free and a better way to organize your researches.
REGISTER_CTA.LIST_ITEM_2: No setup. Sign up and start working in one second.
REGISTER_CTA.LIST_ITEM_3: Free storage, all your researches in one place.
REGISTER_CTA.LIST_ITEM_4: Keep your Ecommerce researches private and secure with the highest standards.
REGISTER_CTA.BUTTON_TITLE: Register to use all our services

ABOUT_PAGE.TITLE: We know the Ecommerce market. In fact, we create research on it.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_1: At Monitorables, we provide highly detailed studies, covering a good number of industries, across the globe- as well as industry knowledge that is particularly interesting for the global markets. Monitorables.com is the world's most trustworthy and reliable provider of necessary Ecommerce market analysis and research. We create valuable in-depth reports on many Ecommerce services and products across the globe.
ABOUT_PAGE.CTA_PARAGRAPH_1: Our online store offers a range of ready-to-buy Ecommerce reports.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_2: Although quantitative and qualitative Ecommerce market research is now trending in the world, just a few years back, the practice was virtually unknown in many countries. As a result, companies, political institutions, and development cooperation organizations lacked reliable data to work with. At Monitorables, we aim to bridge that gap, thanks to our highly-skilled researchers.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_3: We collect vital information using state-of-the-art survey systems that guarantee the efficient collection and the highest data quality. Predict future product demands, do not miss out global opportunities. Our market research solutions cover a full range of industries.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_4: We work with local market research institutes to include the country-specific characteristics of the market and the cultural background (religion, history, ethnicity).
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_5: More so, thanks to its many years of activity worldwide, we have a network of carefully selected partner institutes that meet our requirements for quality, reliability, and flexibility.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_6: Here in Monitorables, we provide in-country analysts presents the depth of local business report needed in today's multicultural market. Our industry specialist crew guarantees the consistency of our analysis.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_7: With a comprehensive network around the world, Ecommerce market research on each significant trend, we give you a powerful entrance to the real story behind consumer behavior.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_8: Monitorables can identify your next opportunity. Find out about emerging countries and economies in no time.
ABOUT_PAGE.CTA_PARAGRAPH_2: View our award-winning Ecommerce market researches today

REFUND_PAGE.TITLE: Thank you for shopping at Monitorables.

TERMS_CONDITIONS_PAGE.TITLE: Please read these terms and conditions before using our service.

COOKIE_PAGE.TITLE: Cookies policy explains what cookies are and how we use them.
